channel.title: BattleScape
channel.description:
[CENTER] [URL=http://www.battle-scape.com/][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/10eiqle.png[/img][/URL]
Latest update is Bounty Hunter! [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qg19-LmzTO0[/youtube] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1glidi.png[/img]
[U][COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Introduction[/SIZE][/COLOR][/U]
[I]One of the oldest private servers around - history starting from before 2007. Some previous names include BattleScape Isle, BattleScape Blitz, BattleScape 317, and BattleScape 523.
The client has the ability to load different models depending on your preferred era of RuneScape, all while still playing the same server. Character Model/Emote Selection: 474, 525, 562, 603, 718[/I]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/3vpye.png[/img] [URL=http://www.battle-scape.com/pages.php?pageid=17]Register[/URL]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/63r9mw.png[/img]
[U][COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Clan Community[/SIZE][/COLOR][/U]
[I]Our clan community is very active. There are wars between clans all the time, and also a full version of the Clan Wars minigame that teams can play.[/I]
[IMG]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/2317/120805125546.png[/img] [IMG]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/3503/120820054852.png[/img] [IMG]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/8510/120818064920.png[/img] [IMG]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/9095/activepurecommunity.png[/img]
[U][COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Features[/SIZE][/COLOR][/U] [I] An amazing combat system Bounty Hunter craters Full Clan Wars: clan chat leaders challenge eachother Custom Pest Control minigame based on CoD: Zombies with over 50 rounds and 10 bosses Dominion Tower: Battle against 35 unique bosses and 50 rounds in completion mode or survival mode Gamble money by playing Black Jack HighScores (Custom PKScores added) Double XP weekends PvP weapons, Chaotics, Dragon claws, Hand cannon, Abyssal vine whip, auras, etc Social Slayer 2 Worlds EP system with PK points Corporeal beast Tormented demons God Wars Duel Arena 63 Wave Fight Caves Barrows Warriors Guild [/I]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2djp6x3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2zss6l5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2lj437k.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/dvn3pu.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/34o6jwk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2hxn9tk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/s3o515.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/mht5b5.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/v3hrlz.png[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/WY53[/img]
[IMG]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/5249/phatsetstake.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/fvxowx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/knmmc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg801/scaled.php?server=801&filename=70vls.png&res=landing[/img]
[IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/2452/120808203528.png[/img] [/CENTER]

item.title: BattleScape
item.dc:creator: @_Palidino _Palidino_
item.description:
@_Palidino wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:4, topic:463451”]> Becomes Palidino76

Still resets Character Files

It’s O.K. though. :mad:[/quote]

Um, what? The last reset was over 6 months ago.

mrenog.png1024×245

Some pretty good Monday activity going on.

Read full topic

item.description:

One of the only great servers these days, I might start playing this again some day. Best of luck to you pali.

item.title: BattleScape
item.dc:creator: @_Palidino _Palidino_
item.description:
@_Palidino wrote:

[CENTER]

Latest update is Bounty Hunter!
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qg19-LmzTO0[/youtube]

[COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Introduction[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[I]One of the oldest private servers around - history starting from before 2007.
Some previous names include BattleScape Isle, BattleScape Blitz, BattleScape 317, and BattleScape 523.

The client has the ability to load different models depending on your preferred era of RuneScape, all while still playing the same server.
Character Model/Emote Selection: 474, 525, 562, 603, 718[/I]

Register

63r9mw.png715×330

[COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Clan Community[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Our clan community is very active. There are wars between clans all the time, and also a full version of the Clan Wars minigame that teams can play.




[COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Features[/SIZE][/COLOR]

An amazing combat system
Bounty Hunter craters
Full Clan Wars: clan chat leaders challenge eachother
Custom Pest Control minigame based on CoD: Zombies with over 50 rounds and 10 bosses
Dominion Tower: Battle against 35 unique bosses and 50 rounds in completion mode or survival mode
Gamble money by playing Black Jack
HighScores (Custom PKScores added)
Double XP weekends
PvP weapons, Chaotics, Dragon claws, Hand cannon, Abyssal vine whip, auras, etc
Social Slayer
2 Worlds
EP system with PK points
Corporeal beast
Tormented demons
God Wars
Duel Arena
63 Wave Fight Caves
Barrows
Warriors Guild

2zss6l5.png713×336

dvn3pu.png761×509

[/CENTER]
